doc:
Sean Maher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sean_Maher 0 Sean Maher (born April 16, 1975) is an American actor. He is known for his portrayal of Simon Tam in the science fiction television series Firefly and follow-up movie Serenity. Sean_Maher ( born April_16_,_1975 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known for his_portrayal of Simon_Tam in the_science_fiction_television_series_Firefly_and_follow-up_movie_Serenity .
